name: D. Counting Rhyme
statement:
You are given an array of integers a_1, a_2,
ldots, a_n.A pair of integers (i, j), such that 1
le i < j
le n, is called , if there an integer k (1
le k
le n) such that a_i is divisible by a_k and a_j is divisible by a_k at
the same time.Please, find the number of good pairs.
